card.name: Advent of the Wurm
card.text: Put a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample onto the battlefield.

card.name: AEtherling
card.text: {U}: Exile AEtherling. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. {U}: AEtherling can't be blocked this turn. {1}: AEtherling gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}: AEtherling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Alive // Well
card.text: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield. Fuse // You gain 2 life for each creature you control. Fuse

card.name: Armed // Dangerous
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn. Fuse // All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so. Fuse

card.name: Ascended Lawmage
card.text: Flying, hexproof

card.name: Awe for the Guilds
card.text: Monocolored creatures can't block this turn.

card.name: Azorius Cluestone
card.text: {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. {W}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Azorius Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Azorius Guildgate
card.text: Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Beck // Call
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield this turn, you may draw a card. Fuse // Put four 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield. Fuse

card.name: Beetleform Mage
card.text: {G}{U}: Beetleform Mage gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Blast of Genius
card.text: Choose target creature or player. Draw three cards, then discard a card. Blast of Genius deals damage equal to the discarded card's converted mana cost to that creature or player.

card.name: Blaze Commando
card.text: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage, put two 1/1 red and white Soldier creature tokens with haste onto the battlefield.

card.name: Blood Baron of Vizkopa
card.text: Lifelink, protection from white and from black As long as you have 30 or more life and an opponent has 10 or less life, Blood Baron of Vizkopa gets +6/+6 and has flying.

card.name: Blood Scrivener
card.text: If you would draw a card while you have no cards in hand, instead draw two cards and lose 1 life.

card.name: Boros Battleshaper
card.text: At the beginning of each combat, up to one target creature attacks or blocks this combat if able and up to one target creature can't attack or block this combat.

card.name: Boros Cluestone
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. {R}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Boros Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Boros Guildgate
card.text: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Boros Mastiff
card.text: Battalion - Whenever Boros Mastiff and at least two other creatures attack, Boros Mastiff gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Breaking // Entering
card.text: Target player puts the top eight cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Fuse // Put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste until end of turn. Fuse

card.name: Bred for the Hunt
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Bronzebeak Moa
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Bronzebeak Moa gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Carnage Gladiator
card.text: Whenever a creature blocks, that creature's controller loses 1 life. {1}{B}{R}: Regenerate Carnage Gladiator.

card.name: Catch // Release
card.text: Gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Fuse // Each player sacrifices an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, a land, and a planeswalker. Fuse

card.name: Clear a Path
card.text: Destroy target creature with defender.

card.name: Council of the Absolute
card.text: As Council of the Absolute enters the battlefield, name a card other than a creature or land card. Your opponents can't cast cards with the chosen name. Spells with the chosen name you cast cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Crypt Incursion
card.text: Exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard. You gain 3 life for each card exiled this way.

card.name: Deadbridge Chant
card.text: When Deadbridge Chant enters the battlefield, put the top ten cards of your library into your graveyard. At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Debt to the Deathless
card.text: Each opponent loses two times X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Deputy of Acquittals
card.text: Flash When Deputy of Acquittals enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.text: {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. {U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Dimir Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.text: Target player discards two cards. Fuse // Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Fuse

card.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control becomes a 4/4 blue and red Dragon, loses all abilities, and gains flying. Overload {3}{U}{U}{R}{R}

card.name: Drown in Filth

card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creature tokens you control.

card.name: Flesh // Blood
card.text: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the power of the card you exiled. Fuse // Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player. Fuse

card.name: Gaze of Granite
card.text: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost X or less.

card.name: Give // Take
card.text: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature. Fuse // Remove all +1/+1 counters from target creature you control. Draw that many cards. Fuse

card.text: Whenever Haazda Snare Squad attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.

card.text: You may tap or untap target permanent, then you may tap or untap another target permanent. Cipher

card.text: Deathtouch {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.text: {5}{G}: Kraul Warrior gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Lavinia of the Tenth
card.text: Protection from red When Lavinia of the Tenth enters the battlefield, detain each nonland permanent your opponents control with converted mana cost 4 or less.

card.name: Legion's Initiative
card.text: Red creatures you control get +1/+0. White creatures you control get +0/+1. {R}{W}, Exile Legion's Initiative: Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next combat, return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control and those creatures gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Lyev Decree
card.text: Detain up to two target creatures your opponents control.

card.name: Master of Cruelties
card.text: First strike, deathtouch Master of Cruelties can only attack alone. Whenever Master of Cruelties attacks a player and isn't blocked, that player's life total becomes 1. Master of Cruelties assigns no combat damage this combat.

card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Maze Sentinel

card.name: Maze's End
card.text: Maze's End enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {3}, {T}, Return Maze's End to its owner's hand: Search your library for a Gate card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. If you control ten or more Gates with different names, you win the game.

card.name: Melek, Izzet Paragon
card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may cast the top card of your library if it's an instant or sorcery card. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your library, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Mending Touch
card.text: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Mindstatic
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {6}.

card.name: Mirko Vosk, Mind Drinker
card.text: Flying Whenever Mirko Vosk, Mind Drinker deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals four land cards, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Morgue Burst
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Morgue Burst deals damage to target creature or player equal to the power of the card returned this way.

card.name: Mutant's Prey
card.text: Target creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Nivix Cyclops
card.text: Defender Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Nivix Cyclops gets +3/+0 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Notion Thief
card.text: Flash If an opponent would draw a card except the first one he or she draws in each of his or her draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

card.name: Obzedat's Aid
card.text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Opal Lake Gatekeepers
card.text: When Opal Lake Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, you may draw a card.

card.text: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Draw two cards.

card.name: Plasm Capture
card.text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next precombat main phase, add X mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Pontiff of Blight
card.text: Extort Other creatures you control have extort.

card.name: Possibility Storm
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell from his or her hand, that player exiles it, then exiles cards from the top of his or her library until he or she exiles a card that shares a card type with it. That player may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then he or she puts all cards exiled with Possibility Storm on the bottom of his or her library in a random order.

card.name: Profit // Loss
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Fuse // Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. Fuse

card.name: Progenitor Mimic
card.text: You may have Progenitor Mimic enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield except it gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this creature isn't a token, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of this creature."

card.name: Protect // Serve
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn. Fuse // Target creature gets -6/-0 until end of turn. Fuse

card.name: Punish the Enemy
card.text: Punish the Enemy deals 3 damage to target player and 3 damage to target creature.

card.name: Putrefy
card.text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.text: Bloodrush - {1}{R}, Discard Pyrewild Shaman: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Pyrewild Shaman is in your graveyard, you may pay {3}. If you do, return Pyrewild Shaman to your hand.

card.name: Ral Zarek

card.name: Ready // Willing
card.text: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. Untap each creature you control. Fuse // Creatures you control gain deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn. Fuse

card.name: Reap Intellect
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose up to X nonland cards from it and exile them. For each card exiled this way, search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Render Silent
card.text: Counter target spell. Its controller can't cast spells this turn.

card.name: Renegade Krasis
card.text: Evolve Whenever Renegade Krasis evolves, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Renounce the Guilds
card.text: Each player sacrifices a multicolored permanent.

card.name: Restore the Peace
card.text: Return each creature that dealt damage this turn to its owner's hand.

card.name: Riot Control
card.text: You gain 1 life for each creature your opponents control. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

card.name: Riot Piker
card.text: First strike Riot Piker attacks each turn if able.

card.text: Rot Farm Skeleton can't block. {2}{B}{G}, Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard: Return Rot Farm Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.text: Bloodrush - {R}, Discard Rubblebelt Maaka: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Varolz, the Scar-Striped
